channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Greetings from Andhra Pradesh, India, where a fragrant food stand feeds working women
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: The fight to beat neglected tropical diseases was going well. 2025 could change that
item.description: The campaign to prevent and treat these diseases has seen great success thanks to a USAID program. Now that program is gone.

item.title: The Fed is expected to cut rates. And, Afghan CIA fighters feel abandoned by the U.S.

item.title: Machado's daughter accepts Nobel Peace Prize in Venezuelan opposition leader's absence
item.description: Machado — who has been in hiding for nearly a year — was still expected in Oslo later in the day.

item.title: Author Sophie Kinsella, who penned the 'Shopaholic' books, has died at 55
item.description: The author, whose real name was Madeleine Sophie Wickham, was diagnosed with an aggressive form of brain cancer in late 2022.

item.title: Oboe raises $16 million from a16z for its AI-powered course generation platform
item.description: Oboe has raised $16 million in funding for its learning app. The company now lets users generate unlimited courses for free.

item.title: Pacific Northwest braces for more heavy rain, after powerful storm caused flooding, rescues

item.description: The e-commerce giant says it will expand the service to additional cities in 2026.

item.title: Unacademy’s founder says startup is now worth less than $500M, confirms M&A talks
item.description: Unacademy's valuation has dropped by over 85% from its pandemic-era peak price tag of $3.5 billion, its founder said.

item.title: ChatGPT is Apple’s most downloaded app of 2025 in the US
item.description: This is ChatGPT's first year as the No. 1 app on the U.S. App Store by downloads.
